snippet.title: Project Shore - Crucible of Blood teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Project Shore is a single-player tactical RPG featuring a unique combat system focused on indirect control over multiple squads of characters in large scale battle scenarios, reminiscent of MMORPG raids - with you as the raid leader.

Crucible of Blood closed test begins on July 16th!
Join our Discord and be among the first to play: https://discord.gg/q8VcWeB
